desc: Home of the Angel of Water and Cherubum products

layout.text: The Angel of Water’s superior design now brings elegance, simplicity, safety, and dignity to colon irrigation. The Angel of Water Surround, a gravity-fed open design, is the system chosen by the finest resorts, medical spas, and integrative wellness centers around the world.

"As health care providers we have found the Angel of Water colon irrigation session an invaluable tool to help improve our patients’ health and wellness.

The Angel of Water system provides a very thorough colon cleanse in a very discreet and comfortable manner. Our patients consistently state the experience with the Angel of Water system far exceeds their experiences with other systems. This fact is borne out by the high percentage of patients who return to our clinic for multiple sessions."
